question: Identify the true statement regarding the light reaction of photosynthesis:
explanation: The light-dependent reactions of photosynthesis involve Photosystem I (PSI) and Photosystem II (PSII) working together.

choices.value: a. Splitting of water molecule is associated with PS I (False)
b. PS I and PS II involved in the formation of NADPH (True)
c. The reaction center of PS I is Chlorophyll a with absorption peak at 680 nm (True)
d. The reaction center of PS II is Chlorophyll a with absorption peak at 700 nm (True)
